Kyocera printers by SNMPv2

Available versions


  • ver. 5.4


Download ver. 5.4

Kyocera printers by SNMPv2

Overview

Template created for Kyocera ECOSYS m3655idn. Works in any Kyocera printer.

Contains items for:

  • Printer name
  • Cartridge name
  • Serial Number
  • Printer status
  • Total pages printed
  • Printed with toner
  • Toner capacity
  • Toner level (%)

Triggers for:

  • Toner < 5%

Macros used

  • {$COMM} for Community Name
